1667370.name: Fantasy Grounds - Pathfinder 2 RPG - Lost Omens Azarketi Web Supplement
1667370.description:
This module is free with the purchase of another paid item in our store.
In order to check out and have the item added to your account, you must have a final cart amount greater than $0. You can add other items to your cart and check out with any number of free items as long as you have one or more non-free items. Alternately, you can manually install this module by downloading the file and placing it in your modules folder.
Manual Download Link
Pathfinder 2 RPG - Lost Omens Azarketi Web Supplement
An excerpt from Absalom, City of Lost Omens, presenting rules for a new ancestry: azarketis. Azarketis are a group of amphibious humanoids with ties to ancient Azlant. These new rules allow you to play an azarketi right away, but if you want more information on azarketis, new heritages, and more ancestry feats, make sure to check out the additional content in the Lost Omens Ancestry Guide!

This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds.
Includes a Fantasy Grounds reference manual providing all of the web supplement content, plus Fantasy Grounds drag/drop data:
  • 1 new ancestry - the azarketi
  • 5 new heritages
  • 12 new feats
  • 2 new weapons
  • Evocative artwork
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Martin Blake
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
